content: Compose a tweet with a minimum of 10 words that highlights one specific environmental issue relevant to your local area, using the hashtag #WorldEnvironmentDay. Additionally, include at least one statistic or data point related to the issue and a call to action for your followers to take tangible steps towards addressing the problem. Lastly, attach a relevant image or infographic to the tweet to further enhance the impact of the message.

"Air pollution in [Your Local Area] is rising, with PM2.5 levels exceeding safe limits by 40%. Let's take action! Use public transport and plant more trees. 🌳🌍 #WorldEnvironmentDay #CleanAirNow"

[Attach an image or infographic showing air pollution statistics and solutions]
